2.「５００年前と 現代の破邪舟師| そして エテーネの民……| みなさまを 心より: The Ship Shapers from both past and present,|and the one from Ethene... I welcome you|here with my deepest gratitude.

3.「大地の箱舟は なにゆえ 安全に| アストルティアの地を 運行できるか| 考えた: Have you ever wondered what makes the Ark of|the Earth able to travel throughout the lands|of Astoltia so safely?

4.「……そう。かつて 天の箱舟と呼ばれし| この舟に 秘められた| 破邪のチカラが: Yes... it was once called the Ark of Heaven,|and the sacred power within it keeps evil at|bay.

5.「つまり 大地の箱舟は| あなたがたが あやつる破邪舟と ある意味では| 近しい: In other words, the Ark of the Earth may be,|in some sense, a close relative to the Sacred|Ships that you sail.

6.「もしかして……| 破邪舟を 強化する方法って！: So, that means... a way to strengthen the|Sacred Ship!

7.「お察しのとおり。| 破邪の紋章にて 大地の箱舟自体を| 破邪舟とする術のことで: As you may have already guessed, that Sacred|Crest can transform the Ark of the Earth into|a Sacred Ship of its own.

8.「私の破邪舟では 歯が立たなかった| レイダメテスも……| この 大地の箱舟なら: My Sacred Ship was no match for dat|Reidametes... but dis Ark of the Earth is a|different story!

9.「<cs_pchero>様。| あなたは かつて ５００年前へ向かい| 過去の世: <cs_pchero>. You once traveled|500 years into the past and saved the world|of that era.

10.「時は 線路と同様 円環を 描くもの……。: Like a railroad track, time loops again and|again...

11.「それゆえ 時の円環は この時代を救うため| ５００年前より| エルジュ様を 呼: Therefore, the wheel of time has called upon|Erju from 500 years ago to save the world|in the present era.

12.「時の円環が 崩れれば 運命は 巡り巡りて| 救ったはずの ５００年前の世界も|:
If the wheel of time is broken, fate will once|again repeat and the world from 500 years|ago will fail to be saved...|
|That's why I am here to guide you.

14.「この時代に 冥王ネルゲルが復活するから| 大地の箱舟に乗れ……というのが| 師: My master foretold a prophecy that Nergel|would reappear in this time... and that I|should board the Ark of the Earth.

15.「あの時は 何を 言ってるんだ？| と思ったけれど こうして ボクは| ゼーベス: At the time, I had no idea what he meant...|But then I met Zebes, and was able to come|here into the future.

17.「大地の箱舟を 破邪舟に 変えるには| 破邪舟師のチカラと 時渡りのチカラ| す: For the Ark of the Earth to become the Sacred|Ship, we need the combined power of a Ship|Shaper, a time traveler, and the Sacred Crest.

18.「すでに 大地の箱舟には| 破邪の紋章を 装着しております。: The Ark of the Earth has already been fitted|with the crest.

19.「ふたりの 破邪舟師よ！| そして エテーネの民よ！| ……今こそ 大地の箱舟に: To both of the Ship Shapers and the one of|Ethene! Now is the time to lend your power to|the Ark of the Earth!

20.「これまでとは ケタ違いの チカラが| 私の身体に みなぎっています！: I've never felt a kinda power like this|before! My body's tinglin'!

21.「エルジュ様が 死の宿命より| 解き放たれたことが 子孫である あなた様に| 良: I hope that Erju's escape from a certain death|has had a positive influence on you, his|descendant...

22.「わたくし 時の車掌ゼーベスは| 今 ここに 特別列車 大地の破邪舟の| 運行を: I, Zebes, the Conductor of Time, hereby|approve service of the Sacred Ship of the|Earth!

25.「大地の破邪舟……出発 進行ーっ！: Sacred Ark of the Earth... proceed with|departure!

26.「この ケイトさまに黙って| 冥王ネルゲル討伐に 向かうたぁ| 水くせぇぜ……<: So you're gonna go ahead and defeat that|Nergel guy without takin' ME? I'm heartbroken,|<cs_pchero>...

28.「へへへッ。| あと ちょっと…で……？: Heh heh... just a little bit...

30.「ようやく ここまで たどり着いたか。| 待ちかねたぞ <cs_pchero>よ: So, you've finally made it this far...|I've been waiting for you, <cs_pchero>.

31.「この冥王の前に 己が魂を捧げるため| 自ら 現れるとは よい心がけよな。: How kind of you to show yourself before the|Netherlord and offer your soul.

32.「……ネるゲル……さ…マ……| 我ラ……貴方様の……おチカらに……: Lord... Nergel... we lend... you...|...our power....

33.「冥府ノ…縛鎖…ハ……| 我ラの怨念で 編まれタもノ……！| 生者にハ 決しテ: The shackles of the... underworld are woven...|...with our hatred... the living can... never|hope... to break them...!!

34.「さァ ネるゲル様！| ソやつヲ倒しィ……こたビこォそ…ッ！| アすトルテぃアを: Lord Nergel! You must... defeat them all...|...and destroy Astoltia!

37.「誰に 指図しておる。| ……消えろ。: Who are you to order me around?|Begone.

39.「ひさかたぶりの 戦いに 水をさす| 無粋な配下どもを 罰したまでだ。: I merely punished those who would interfere|in our long coming battle.

40.「……復活の祭壇で 感じたとおり| あの頃より はるかに強くなったようだな。|: Just as I felt when I was resurrected again,|you have become much stronger. You have|a different look about you...

41.「だが……| 我は あまねく 死を統べる者。: However... I am the one who commands dominion|over death.

42.「貴様が 敵を倒せば 倒すほど| ……多くの死を振りまけば 振りまくほど！| 我: The more of your enemies that you defeat, the|more death you wreak! My power will continue|to grow indefinitely!

43.「さりとて……| あとひとつ 足りないものがある。: However... there is just one thing missing.

44.「この アストルティアで| もっとも 強き者である 貴様の魂を| 喰らったとき！: Only when I have consumed the soul of the most|powerful being in Astoltia will I truly be|whole!

45.「さあ！ 決着をつけようぞ！| 我は 貴様の死を 復活の のろしとし| こたびこ: Come! Let us end this here and now! I shall|use your death as the final step of my|resurrection, and I will destroy Astoltia!

46.「生きとし生ける者は すべて| 死からは 逃れられぬのだ！！: No mortal being can escape death!!

47.「こたびも 貴様の 勝ちのようだな。| ……<cs_pchero>よ。: It seems you've bested me once again,|<cs_pchero>...

48.「だが 我は あまねく死を統べる者。: Yet... I command dominion over death.

49.「貴様が 戦い続けるかぎり| 我は 貴様が倒した者の 魂を 喰ろうて| 何度でも: Know that as long as you continue to fight, I|will feed on the souls of your fallen foes|and I shall rise again and again...

51.「……いずれまた 相まみえようぞ。: We shall meet each other again...

52.「やったな <cs_pchero>！| ボクたちの勝利だ！: We did it! We beat him!

53.「うわあっ！？| マズい……急いで 脱出しよう！: Huh?! This looks bad... we need to get out of|here, now!

54.「みなさま お見事でございました。| ささ 急いで 地上へ 戻りましょう。: You've done well, everyone. Now then, let us|return to the land below.

55.「大地の破邪舟……出発 進行ーっ！: Sacred Ark of the Earth... proceed with|departure!

56.「冥王ネルゲルも レイダメテスも| 消え去った……。| もう 心配ないだろう。: Both Nergel and Reidametes have vanished...|Looks like we can finally rest easy.

57.「……これも この時代で 出会った| 様々な人々の おかげだな。: I owe everything to the many people I met in|this era...

58.「そして 誰より 君のね……。| <cs_pchero> 本当に ありがとう。: But I think I owe you more than anyone else...|Thank you so much, <cs_pchero>.

59.「昔……君と 約束しただろ。: I made you a promise a long time ago...

60.「たとえ 生きる時代が 違っていても| 君とボクは ずっと 友達だ……って。: That even though we live in different eras,|you and I will always be friends...

61.「ボクの友達が生きる| この時代の アストルティアを| 救うことができて 本当に: I'm really glad I was able to save the|Astoltia of this era, the one you live in...

62.「賢者のみんなや 破邪舟師たちにも| できれば 別れのあいさつが したかったけど: I wish I could've said goodbye to all of the|sages and the Ship Shapers, but... it looks|like I'm almost out of time.

63.「ボクは 自分の時代に戻る。| 残念だけど 今のボクが| 君と話せるのは これが: I'll be returning to my own time. It's|unfortunate, but... this will be the last|time we'll ever speak to each other.

64.「世界の危機は もう こりごりだけど| もうすこしだけ <cs_pchero>|: With this crisis ended, I'd like to travel|with you just a little bit longer,|<cs_pchero>...

65.「よッ！ オメェも 乗ってたとはなァ。| <cs_pchero>！: Yo! Didn't know you were ridin' the train,|too.

66.「なぁなぁ 聞いたかよっ！？| 突然 レイダメテスが 消えちまったって！| あり: Hey, hey, didja hear?! Reidametes just poofed|outta nowhere! I'm sure that X was behind it!

67.「しっかし お前も 冥王討伐を狙ってたのに| 残念だったなァ。まっ エックスさん: But, you were tryin' to beat the Netherlord|too, weren'tcha? Hey, no one comes close to|how good X is!

68.「やっぱ あのお方は すげーや！| さっすが 伝説の冒険者だぜぃっ。: They're amazin'! A legendary adventurer for|sure!

69.「……そういや オメェのツレの| あの ヒョロいのは どこいったんだ？| ずっと: What happened to short stuff that was with|you? You guys seemed pretty stuck together.

70.「……ふーん。故郷に 帰っちまったのか。| まぁ そう ショボくれんなよ。| お: Mmmm... so he went back home. Well, don't|worry 'bout it. I'm sure you'll see him again|eventually from travelin' around.

71.「さて……と。次は どこへ行くかねえ。| アストルティアにゃぁ| まだまだ 冒険: Now then... where to go next? So many places|in Astoltia I haven't explored yet...

72.「野越え 山越え 海越えて……いや。| アタシらなら 天だって超えられるさ。|: Through fields, over mountains, across seas...|...no. I'll even surpass the heavens!|Right, <cs_pchero>?!

73.「次は～ グレン城～ グレン城～。: Next stop is Glen Castle... Glen Castle...

74.「おっと。ずいぶん 長話しちまったぜ。| じゃあな <cs_pchero>！|: Oops. Looks like I was talkin' too much.|Welp, <cs_pchero>! Next time|we meet, I'll beat ya for sure!

75.「……みなさま このたびは| 当 大地の箱舟に ご乗車いただき| まことに あり: To everyone on board, thank you very much for|choosing to ride the Ark of the Earth.

76.「みなさまの これからの旅が| すばらしきものと なりますよう| 我々一同 心よ: We sincerely wish you all the best in all of|your future travels.

77.<center>待っていたぞ <pc>……。|忌々しき エテーネの生き残りよ。: I've been waiting for you, <pc>....|Wretched survivor of Ethene...

78.<center>我が居城 蘇りし神殿レイダメテスへ|よくぞ 参った。: Welcome to my restored domain of Reidametes.|You've done well to come here.

79.<center>貴様を倒し あの雪辱を 果たさぬかぎりは|我が 復活は 完全とは: My resurrection will not be complete until my|redemption of finally defeating you...

80.<center>貴様が いかほど チカラをつけたか|この死が支配する世界において: I will show you just how powerful I have|become in my domain of death.

81.<center>さあ 早く 我が玉座まで 来るがよい。|……我は 貴様の訪れを: Now, make haste to my throne. I eagerly await|your arrival...
